thread.title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Are Now in Brazil—And Getting Hounded by Fans and Paparazzi
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Are Now in Brazil—And Getting Hounded by Fans and Paparazzi

title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Are Now in Brazil—And Getting Hounded by Fans and Paparazzi
text:
By Kayleigh Roberts Mar 26, 2017 Selena Gomez and The Weeknd are continuing their world tour of love this weekend, now in Brazil. Selena flew to Colombia to join The Weeknd on the South American leg of his tour and they traveled together to Brazil, where they were swarmed by adoring fans. A post shared by Selena & Justin Updates™ (@jelenasenergy) on Mar 25, 2017 at 8:25pm PDT   In videos posted by fans, the attention looks, admittedly, overwhelming, but Brazil is clearly excited to have Selena and The Weeknd visiting. A post shared by Selena & Justin Updates™ (@jelenasenergy) on Mar 25, 2017 at 7:37pm PDT Most Popular 
— Selena Gomez News (@LifeWithSelG) March 26, 2017 And The Weeknd (whose real name is Abel Tesfaye) was adorably protective of Selena the entire time. A post shared by Selena & Justin Updates™ (@jelenasenergy) on Mar 25, 2017 at 11:20pm PDT More from ELLE:
